nodes.text: The Sargesso asteroids was a cluster of asteroids in the Sargesso system.

Meeko Ghintee once lured a Galactic Republic Tri-Mark VII Interceptor into an ambush in these asteroids, where he disabled it and killed its occupants by destroying the life-support systems. Meeko kept this ship, calling it the Longshot.
The real-world Sargasso Sea is home to a sizeable debris field.
